name: imagment
description: Configurable image review that returns segments of the image

scripts.release:patch: git push --set-upstream origin main && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: git push --set-upstream origin main && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: git push --set-upstream origin main && npm version major && git push && git push --tags
